originalText.text: Mestra Edna and her students are an amazing capoeira group!!!  As a martial artist and karateka, I had only a general idea about capoeira.  Mestra Edna opened my eyes to the world of capoeira and the dimensions within it - including its history of resistance against oppression, Brazilian culture (language and music).  Her quality over quantity instruction has allowed me to develop according to my age and physical limitations.  She pushes us with the sensitivity of a medical practitioner, yet her own mastery of the art allows us to see the detail potential within the smallest of movements.   This art is not easy, and i have a very long way to go.  Mestra Edna's nurturing and disciplined spirit has encouraged me to stick with the training, despite my busy life.  I highly recommend her quality training for everyone with the drive to face physical challenges.  Martial arts are not only a test of our physical self, but our mental fortitude.  Check her classes out now!!!

originalText.text: Capoeira is a martial art that is both challenging and rewarding. Training with a world class master, Mestra Edna Lima, makes learning this martial art a lot less intimidating. I am someone with no prior knowledge and I also started later in life (I’m am 50) so at first I asked myself “is this for me“? Mestra has answered this question time and again through her work. She gets to know her students and our abilities quite quickly and she is able to differentiate her instruction to meet each of our needs. She pushes us to get better but doesn’t compare us to more advanced students. She knows how much she can push each and every student. What I truly love is her respect for each of her students and how she can knows what we need to do our very best in the game. She’s also very thorough in explaining and showing us the techniques. This has been most helpful for me. For example, the positioning of the body for a particular kick. There are also the other students that help out the less skilled students learn. So all around it’s a respectful learning environment. I highly recommend capoeira with Mestra Edna Lima

originalText.text:
Great axé, and learning from one of the true masters of capoeira, balances the formality of a martial art with Brazilian warmth.
Obrigado Mestra Edna Lima

originalText.text: Trainings with a true master of the craft. And a great group of people.
